entry.title: JavaScript Type Checking – How to Check Type in JS with typeof()

You can create a variable in JavaScript without defining the type of value you can store in the variable. This can affect your program and cause bugs

entry.title: How to Improve Your Data Privacy – A Personal Guide to Protecting Your Online Information
entry.summary: What's the difference between data privacy and data security? Data security is about protecting your data from unauthorized access (basically ensuring that hackers can't access your data). Data privacy, on the other hand, is about giving you more granular control over how (and by whom) your data is accessed, used,

entry.title: Advent Calendars For Web Designers And Developers (2022 Edition)
entry.summary: Are you ready for the countdown to Christmas? This year, the web community was once again busy creating tech advent calendars jam-packed with fantastic content to sweeten your days. But which ones to follow? We help you find the right one, whether you’re a front-end dev, UX designer, or content strategist.

entry.title: Accessible Front-End Patterns For Responsive Tables (Part 1)
entry.summary: There is no universal solution for making every kind of table responsive and usable on smaller screens, so we have to rely on various patterns, which Adrian explains in this two-part series.

entry.title: The Anatomy Of Themed Design System Components
entry.summary: The world of design systems can be overwhelming sometimes. There’s a lot to take in when you get into that space! In this article, Dan Donald dives into a simple component and explores some issues, complexity, and power we can encounter.

entry.title: FabUnit: A Smart Way To Control And Synchronize Typo And Space
entry.summary: Today, we’ll take a look at the Sass function that does all the work for you — with no media queries, no breakpoints, and no design jumps. In this article, Fabienne Bielmann explains what FabUnit stands for and why she decided to create her very own responsive magic formula.

entry.title: Endings And New Beginnings (December 2022 Desktop Wallpapers Edition)
entry.summary: December is almost here, so why not spread some holiday love across your devices? We’ve got some beautiful wallpapers to sweeten up the last days of the year.

entry.title: Document Object Model (DOM) Geometry: A Beginner’s Introduction And Guide
entry.summary: In this guide, Pearl Akpan analyzes the methods and properties that make user interface solutions such as infinite scrolling, animating elements on scroll, or even the popular drag and drop achievable, and afterward, dives into some practical use cases for them.

entry.title: Optimizing A Vue App
entry.summary: Prioritizing performance when building our web apps improves the user experience and helps ensure they can be used by as many people as possible. In this article, Michelle Barker will walk you through some of the front-end optimization tips to keep our Vue apps as efficient as possible.

entry.title: A Guide To Keyboard Accessibility: JavaScript (Part 2)

entry.title: A Guide To Image Optimization On Jamstack Sites
entry.summary: In this article, Alba Silvente shows us the theoretical and practical solutions to the most common problems when working with images and how to automate them by using a headless CMS and an image CDN.

entry.title: Using Automated Test Results To Improve Accessibility
entry.summary: In this article, Noah Mashni and Mark Steadman share their approach to how to leverage the automated test results from the accessibility checks to drive change and reach sustainable digital accessibility transformation.

entry.title: A Guide To Keyboard Accessibility: HTML And CSS (Part 1)
entry.summary: In this article, Cristian Diaz covers how to use HTML and CSS to create an accessible experience for keyboard users while mentioning what WCAG criteria we should keep into consideration.

entry.title: How To Search For A Developer Job Abroad
entry.summary: Working abroad is a popular prospect, yet many people — including professionals in the tech sphere — don’t know where to start. In this article, Andrew Stetsenko gives you an ultimate step-by-step guide to finding and making international opportunities happen.
